channel.title: Fresh look at Self-Hosting on WinterFlow.io
channel.description: Recent content in Fresh look at Self-Hosting on WinterFlow.io

item.description: A privacy-focused, local-first, open-source, and ready-to-use alternative for Notion & Miro.One hyper-fused platform for wildly creative minds.
Dozzle is a small lightweight application with a web based interface to monitor Docker logs.
LibreChat is the ultimate open-source app for all your AI conversations, fully customizable and compatible with any AI provider â€” all in one sleek interface
n8n is a workflow automation platform that gives technical teams the flexibility of code with the speed of no-code.
NocoDB allows building no-code database solutions with ease of spreadsheets.
PrivateBin is a minimalist pastebin where the server has zero knowledge of stored data.
Request Baskets is a web service to test HTTP webhooks and notifications
Traefik and CloudFlare is a modern reverse proxy that securely exposes your applications
Traefik and Let’s Encrypt is a modern reverse proxy that securely exposes your applications
Uptime Kuma is an easy-to-use monitoring tool.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
Privacy Policy

Introduction

Your privacy is important to us. It is WinterFlow’s policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, winterflow.com, its subdomains, and other sites we own and operate (collectively, the “Sites”). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit any of our Sites. Please read this policy carefully to understand our practices regarding your information.

item.title: Terms of Service
item.description:
Terms of Service

Welcome to WinterFlow! Please read these Terms of Service (“Terms”) carefully before using our websites, products, and services (collectively, the “Software”). By accessing or using the Software, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, please discontinue use of the Software.

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing or using WinterFlow, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to these Terms, as well as our Privacy Policy.
